thoughts.text: Now that I have saved the information about the best museums in NYC to a file, I can use the list_files command to confirm that the file was created.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the list_files command allows me to confirm that the file was created and is in the current directory.
thoughts.plan: - Use the list_files command to confirm that the file was created.
thoughts.criticism: I should make sure to check that the file is in the correct directory and has the correct name.
